channel.title: OS on Oyyko's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in OS on Oyyko's Blog

item.title: Revisit_OS
item.description: For some reason, I’ve been reviewing OS related stuff lately. hardlink and softlink ln creates hark links. ln -s creates soft (a.k.a symbolic) links. ln -l show the number of hardlinks points to the same inode. hardlink points to the inode. softlink points to the path. pros and cons: hardlink must be on the same partition, can only link to files. softlink can link to a file or directory, no partition limitation.
